org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class liquidfun.b2Draw

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.liquidfun.b2Draw
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    liquidfun

    @NoOffset
public static class liquidfun.b2Draw
extends org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
    Implement and register this class with a b2World to provide debug drawing of physics entities in your game.
